title: hostmaria
author: hostmaria
created_time: November 13, 2022, 09:31:47 PMLast edit: November 14, 2022, 05:14:32 PM by hostmaria
content: [Announcement]We, the Maria Ecosystem have launched $Lats coin for the Latvian community.The meaning of "Lats" > it is the name of the national currency Latvia gave away after joining the economical alliance of the EU (good or bad > not for me to decide).Lats coin is a PivX fork.1st 1000 blocks are PoW, the reward is 100 $Lats/block.1001+ > PoS (staking + masternodes)---The main idea is to resurrect Lats in the digital format and put it in the hands of Latvian webmasters.History of Lats: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Latvian_lats---PoS: from the block 1001 - ∞Algorithm: QuarkPremine: 0Block Time: 60 SecondsMaturity: 100 ConfirmationsMasternode Collateral: 1000 $LatsPort: 45459---Rewards (Proof of Work after the block 1001)Block: 1001 - 501 000Reward in a Single Block: 10Masternode: 6.00 (60%)Staker: 3.00 (30%)Treasury: 1.00 (10%)Halving: 5x halvings every 500'000 blocks (table to be added)---Lats coin phase 1 (Launch) lead developer: Liquid369: https://github.com/Liquid369---Links:Explorer: https://explorer.lats.cc (to be updated)Website: https://www.lats.cc (to be updated)GitHub: https://github.com/orgs/LATS-DAO/dashboardWallets: https://github.com/LATS-DAO/Lats-Core/releasesWhitepaper: .. to be updatedDiscord: https://discord.gg/xVvajam5u2Telegram: https://t.me/latscoin---The first information is very basic: the idea is to leave as much space available for the yet unknown future group of Latvians who will (hopefully) make and keep this coin as decentralised as possible.https://i.imgur.com/oXg4sUp.pngMore information to follow.Helmuts

comments.author: BITDV
comments.body: didn't see any interesting concept here. Just selling the name and news

comments.author: hostmaria
comments.body: just an announcement.. no academic stuff nor "over the moon promises" are to be found here. is this ok? people are way too obsessed with novophilia these days .. this is a project in it's infancy stage.. will see where it goes, who will pick it up (from the Latvian programmer community) and no promises whatsoever are made to anybody.. Great Monday all!Helmuts

comments.author: hostmaria
comments.body: Adjusted Tokenomics:Block Rewards:Ref: https://github.com/LATS-DAO/Lats-Core/blob/main/src/validation.cpp Block 1 to 1000 = 100 $Lats per block (end of the PoW stage)1001 - 2000 = 100 (High reward PoS stage)2001 - 192'000 = 9192'001 - 300'152 = 4.5300'153 - 800'153 = 2.5800'154 - 1'600'154 = 1.51'600'155 - unlimited = 1Masternode vs Staker Reward split:Ref: https://github.com/LATS-DAO/Lats-Core/blob/main/src/validation.cpp Block 1 to 1000 (PoW stage 1) = 100 to Miner1001 - 2'000 (PoS) = 100 to Staker2001 - 192'000 =  6 $Lats coins to MN & 3 $Lats coins to Staker192'001 - 300'152 = 40% MN & 60% Staker = 1.8 coins for MN vs 2.7 for Stake300'153 - 800'153 = 45% MN & 55% Staker = 1.125 vs 1.375800'154 - 1'600'154 = 50% MN & 50% Staker = 0.75 vs 0.751'600'155 - 3'000'155 = 55% MN & 45% Staker = 0.55 vs 0.453'000'156 - 9'900'157 = 60% MN & 40% Staker = 0.6 vs 0.49'900'158 - 16'400'158 = 65% MN & 35% Staker = 0.65 vs 0.3516'400'159 - unlimited = 70% MN & 30% Staker = 0.7 vs 0.3The Budget (also known as DAO payments) will be 10% of the block reward, which users can claim for their budgets every 43'200 blocks.Note: Budget coins are NOT included in a block reward - they come from a Superblock (generated based on approved proposals every 43'200 blocks) with a maximum of 10% of the block rewards.

comments.author: hostmaria
comments.body: We have created an automated bootstrap process for all those who don't want to wait for synchronization: https://bootstrap.lats.cc/// The file will update itself every 4 hoursH
